group_1.narration: That day...@I just happened to see them...
When I came home from school, I stopped to@pick up a poster that had been ripped down.
A gust of wind sent the poster into@the alley next to the store...
That's when I saw someone.@I followed them...
And when I peeked around the corner...
The person who set the fire looked@like they were probably a man...
They were wearing a hat low on@their face and a mask, so I couldn't@see what they looked like...
But they seemed to spend an unusually@long time staring at the fire silently...
I quietly snuck away and was@going to find my father.
But then suddenly someone@grabbed my shoulder!
I couldn't think of anything to say.
The man just kept staring at@me without saying anything.
And that's when I realized...
There was something strange about him.@[textRed:He wasn't... normal]He wasn't...normal...
I pleaded for my life. I was so scared...
The pitch-black eyes gazing at me from@the space between the hat and mask...
...They frightened me so, so much...
Then, without saying a word,@the man walked away...
I sank to the ground in relief.
When I came to my senses, I checked the back@of the store, and saw the fire had grown.
It wasn't long until the store was gone...
